paper_abstract: This article describes a process for disseminating, via the Internet, configurable animated simulations of physical systems-virtual systems-used to visualize System Dynamics concepts. To enable widespread use, software tools readily available under a General Public License (GPL) are used. However, the dynamic systems are simulated and animated using MATLAB(R). (c) 2008 Wiley Periodicals, Inc.
paper_title: Studentp-configurable, web-accessible virtual systems for system dynamics and controls courses
